title: How do patients' perceptions and doctors' images impact patient decisions? Deconstructing online physician selection using multimodal data
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Shizhen Bai, Yongbo Tan, Jiayuan Zhao, Dingyao Yu, Jing Zhang, Qiutong Li
